ing: 1 rotisserie chicken, meat removed and shredded
1 (3 ounce) package ramen noodles (such as NissinÂ® Top Ramen)
des: "This salad is always a hit. Everyone loves it! Can be refrigerated 2 to 3 hours before serving."
ins: Toss chicken meat, cabbage, onions, ramen noodles, sesame seeds, and almonds together in a large bowl. Beat olive oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl; drizzle over the salad and toss to coat.
